title: The Use of Artificial Intelligence in Education.

content.text: In recent years AI has been integrated into various fields. In the context of education, AI has become a crucial element in the teaching-learning process. Read the following text to learn more about it.

content.text: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has rapidly become an integral part of modern education, transforming the way students and teachers interact with learning materials. As technology evolves, educational institutions and individuals are getting used to incorporating AI-driven tools into their curriculum.
